lore: Instead of falling into the supposed trap and sending the ships against the Valkyries, Sigmund sent his army of Pit Worms against them. Helmholtz, who already knew that many of these creatures were at his service, cast a spell that made the ground harder so that the Pit Worms could not emerge from under them as easily.\n\nThe more time a Pit Worm Gladiator spends in front of food (that is, any creature), the greater its desire to devour it, and the more dangerous its bites become.
menagerieDialog: (It never stops wriggling. Frankly, its mannerisms are a bit disconcerting.)
(One benefit of having this creature around is that you never need to worry about disposing of corpses.)
(It's making a disgusting noise with its mouth, not unlike a dog eating oatmeal.)
(It insists on making disgusting sucking noises with its mouth.)
name: Pit Worm Gladiator
